scripts.build:local: wrangler types && astro check && astro build && npm run migrate:local
scripts.build:production: wrangler types && astro check && astro build && npm run migrate:production
scripts.migrate:local: echo 'Y' | wrangler d1 migrations apply $(node scripts/parse-d1.js) --local
scripts.migrate:production: echo 'Y' | wrangler d1 migrations apply $(node scripts/parse-d1.js) --remote
